channel.title: BrokenX V2 Source and Client please!
channel.description:
i have been looking for a nice source and client and the only one i seem to like at the moment is brokenX V2, v1 has so many bugs that v2 doesn't and as i am new to coding, less work = less worries.
Add me on skype @ lee.adam9 i'm from the uk, and i will be accepting all requests.
or comment on this topic a link!
